title: Wife of Malaysia’s ex-prime minister gets ten years’ jail time
dc:creator: Arno Maierbrugger
description:
The wife of the former Malaysian prime minister Najib Razak, Rosmah Mansor, has been sentenced to ten years in prison for soliciting and receiving bribes in exchange for government contracts. The sentence by Malaysia’s High Court came just one week

The post Wife of Malaysia’s ex-prime minister gets ten years’ jail time appeared first on Investvine.
